Print to console variable.description: Log output to console with filename as prefix

body: console.dir(${1:variable}, {showHidden: false, depth: null, colors: true});
Print to console an object recursively a.description: Log the object as intended. No more {a: [Object]}. On a browser console, user can expand the object to access nested object.
Log a string representation of the object as intended. No more {a: [Object]}. Be careful as big object can be hard to read on console.
